name: Barcelona By Bike !
description:
Discovering Barcelona’s seafront by bike is a great, pleasant experience. Barcelona has more than 180 km of cycle lanes, a sunny climate which allow outdoor activities all-year-long! Barcelona is an amazing town, discover part of its 5 km of seafront !
During the itinerary , you’ll find about the history and the transformation of the port and beaches, you’ll discover a fishing district, you’ll see a Olympic Village and a former military citadel witch is now an incredible parc.
You want to know Barcelona in a short time but in a relaxing way, this tour is yours ! All you need to know is ride a bike !
